remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类类似于一些成员 类，该类用于报告的事件数据 ，但这两个类的用途不同。This class parallels some of the members class, which is used to report event data for , but the two classes serve different purposes. 专门用于 替代，后者为中未公开为公共事件的事件提供类处理 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 。 is specifically used for overrides, which offers class handling for an event that is not exposed as a public event in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For details, see .

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于这两个布尔参数，请注意， `true` 仅当值中的更改对呈现很重要时才应报告这些值，或者应在读取现有值时将值解释为。For the two Boolean parameters, note that you should report these as `true` only if the changes in the value are significant to rendering, or should interpret the values as such if reading existing values. 由于精度副作用，大小值中的小更改是可能的，尤其是在将数学函数应用于双精度值时。Minor changes in the size values are possible due to precision side-effects, particularly when mathematical functions are applied to the double values.
